original_text: And when her days to be delivered were fulfilled, behold, there were twins in her womb.
korean_text: 그 해산 기한이 찬즉 태에 쌍둥이가 있었는데

sentences.original_text: And when her days to be delivered were fulfilled
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 해산할 날이 찼을 때

sentences.original_text: behold, there were twins in her womb
